overview: The Johnson family is moving in to a big, old house that has been empty for decades. Olivia, the oldest daughter, experiences inexplicable things. She tries to convince those around her that there is a darker energy in the house, but no one believes her.  She starts questioning whether what she sees actually exists or whether her mind is playing tricks on her.
tagline: Christmas Eve is almost here, will Santa be coming back this year?
title: Merry Xmas
